body_html: I'm not sure about one thing: is your intention to clear the variables in the scope, but preserve them in the graph, or to clear the whole graph? In the first case, I think it's dangerous -- why call it "x" if you're re-doing x? I understand if you want to clear the whole graph, but that can be done with tf.graph().as_default(), no? Please, let me know more of the context so we can solve it!

body: I'm not sure about one thing: is your intention to clear the variables in the scope, but preserve them in the graph, or to clear the whole graph? In the first case, I think it's dangerous -- why call it "x" if you're re-doing x? I understand if you want to clear the whole graph, but that can be done with tf.graph().as_default(), no? Please, let me know more of the context so we can solve it!
